items.label: Misread constraints
items.desc: Overlooked or misinterpreted explicit constraints (n, value ranges, duplicates).

items.label: Wrong IO spec
items.desc: Incorrect function signature, return type, or output ordering.

items.label: Bounds not asked
items.desc: Failed to ask about input size, ranges, or memory limits.

items.label: Mutation assumption wrong
items.desc: Assumed you could or could not mutate inputs without clarifying.

items.label: Structure misclassified
items.desc: Treated a graph as a tree, or ignored cycles / direction / weights.

items.label: Duplicates/uniqueness wrong
items.desc: Assumed unique elements or distinct keys incorrectly.

items.label: Stream vs static
items.desc: Assumed all data is available upfront when it is a stream, or vice versa.

items.label: Overflow/precision unconsidered
items.desc: Did not confirm numeric ranges or precision requirements.

items.label: Wrong data structure
items.desc: Chose a DS that complicates operations or violates constraints.

items.label: Missed sorting unlock
items.desc: Did not sort to enable two-pointers, sweep line, or greedy.

items.label: Missed precomputation
items.desc: Ignored prefix/suffix sums, diffs, frequency maps, or caching.

items.label: Missed graph model
items.desc: Failed to model as a graph when relationships imply edges.

items.label: Greedy invariant wrong
items.desc: Claimed a greedy rule without a valid invariant or proof sketch.

items.label: DP state wrong
items.desc: State/transition do not cover cases or violate optimal substructure.

items.label: Binary search on answer missed
items.desc: Overlooked monotone feasibility enabling answer-space search.

items.label: Overengineering
items.desc: Used advanced DS/algorithms when a simpler approach suffices.

items.label: Time over budget
items.desc: Asymptotic time exceeds constraints or typical judge limits.

items.label: Space over budget
items.desc: Auxiliary space growth violates constraints.

items.label: Pathological worst-case ignored
items.desc: Design fails on adversarial inputs (e.g., degenerate trees, repeated keys).

items.label: Unnecessary passes
items.desc: Multiple full scans where one suffices.

items.label: Recursion depth risk
items.desc: Possible stack overflow not mitigated (no tail/iterative version).

items.label: Off-by-one
items.desc: Inclusive/exclusive bounds wrong.

items.label: Indexing error
items.desc: Accessed out of range or wrong index mapping.

items.label: Bounds check missing
items.desc: Failed to guard empty/singleton or boundary conditions.

items.label: Overflow/precision bug
items.desc: Arithmetic overflow or float comparison issues.

items.label: Integer division confusion
items.desc: Used integer division where float needed or vice versa.

items.label: Mutate during iteration
items.desc: Modified a container while iterating leading to skipped/duplicated elements.

items.label: State not reset
items.desc: Carried state across test cases or calls inadvertently.

items.label: Visited handling wrong
items.desc: Incorrect mark/unmark in traversal causing repeats or misses.

items.label: Early return/continue error
items.desc: Wrong placement of returns causing logic to skip steps.

items.label: Shadowing/variable reuse
items.desc: Reused or shadowed variables causing incorrect values.

items.label: String/Unicode pitfall
items.desc: Incorrect assumptions about characters, casing, or encoding.

items.label: Empty input
items.desc: Did not handle empty collections or null-like values.

items.label: Singleton case
items.desc: Single element or minimal structure not handled.

items.label: All identical / duplicates
items.desc: Degenerate cases where values repeat not handled.

items.label: Sorted / reverse-sorted
items.desc: Best/worst ordering cases missed.

items.label: Extremes / overflow bounds
items.desc: Min/max integers, long strings, deep trees.

items.label: Graph cycles/disconnected
items.desc: Did not handle cycles or multiple components.

items.label: No typical cases
items.desc: Skipped representative normal inputs.

items.label: No edge cases
items.desc: Failed to add corner cases to tests.

items.label: No dry-run
items.desc: Did not step through code with sample input.

items.label: Complexity unstated/incorrect
items.desc: Failed to state or mis-stated time/space complexity.

items.label: Messy structure
items.desc: Monolithic function, no helpers, hard to reason.

items.label: Poor naming/magic numbers
items.desc: Non-descriptive identifiers or unexplained constants.

items.label: Duplication not refactored
items.desc: Copy-paste blocks not extracted to helpers.

items.label: No invariants/comments
items.desc: Key invariants or loop meanings not stated.
